title.narrative: By 2024, vulnerable people have improved access to social welfare services, including in humanitarian context.

description.narrative: Increasing stakeholders capacities; from Institutions and communities to prevent gender-based violence, promote the rights of women and girls, including in humanitarian situations; provide emergency assistance to people who are victims of violence and provide quality essential services to GBV survivors.
